title: ANN-based modeling and reducing dual-fuel engine’s challenging emissions by multi-objective evolutionary algorithm NSGA-II
authors: Lotfan, S., Ghiasi, R.A., Fallah, M., and Sadeghi, M.H.
abstract: This paper develops an artificial neural network (ANN)-based modeling framework for predicting dual-fuel engine emissions. A multi-objective NSGA-II algorithm is used to minimize NOx and CO simultaneously, providing a data-driven method to assist emission control strategies under varying load conditions.

title: Deep Learning-Based Optimization for Vibration Damping in Smart Structures
cite: Proceedings of the 18th International Conference on Smart Structures, pp. 45–52, 2023.
abstract: This paper presents a neural network-based framework for optimizing the damping performance of smart composite structures under vibration loads.
